title: Marathon Infinity Review
description:
From Marathon to Halo, Infinity to Infinite. Marathon Infinity makes you question your destiny across time and dimensions, but it already knows who you are.
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/MandaloreGaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
Voices provided by @GianniMatragrano and @SeigiVA.
Art and animation by @branzoles @sneksucks and @ZloNoNameSov
Thumbnail by @tat2kid714
Also featuring @Raycevick @Civvie11 @noodlefunny and @chilledsanity through collided destinies.
